task.summary: Default task
Main.java - Added a feature that shakes the stage whenever a heart is deducted (Use combination of `TranslateTransition`)
style.css - Changed font style and added bold attribute

Main.java - Added label ID for score, heart, level
style.css - Changed padding, margin attribute, border color, border width

Main.java - Added `showHeartDeductedImage` method to display an image when heart is deducted alongside a smooth transition in, transition out
Block.java - Added ballRadius to make sure block hit is more consistent

Main.java - Solved warning "Explicit type argument can be replaced with <>"
- Solved warning "invocation 'toExternalForm' may produce 'NullPointerException'" by checking if the resource is null before calling to `toExternalForm()` & adding error handling
- Solved warning " 'sceneHeight / 2': integer division in floating-point context"
- Solved warning " 'loadFromSave == false' can be simplified to '!loadFromSave' can be simplified to '!loadFromSave'" by simplifying conditional check
- Solved warning "statement lambda can be replaced with expression lambda" by simplifying the lambda expression
- Solved warning "anonymous new Runnable() can be replaced with lambda" by adding a lambda
Main.java - Remove the -1 score display whenever heart deducted
Main.java - Added some Javadocs

Main.java - Added `showHeartAddedImage` method & method call to display a png image with animation when a heart is added
- Added `showBonusImage` method & method call to display a png image with animation when a bonus ball is activated
Main.java - Added `showGoldenBallImage` method & method call to display a png image when the golden ball is activated
Main.java - Adjusted the naming of png image in resources & applied to changes to `showGoldenBallMethod` method

Main.java - Adjusted code so the flush() and close() methods are only called if outputStream is not null, which prevents the NullPointerException
- Replaced e.printStackTrace() with logging statements for consistency

Main.java - Changed background
style.css - Change style

Main.java - Created a method `createStartMenu()` to create Vbox - Add it to the scene - Initialized the buttons in the `start` method - Insert call method for `createStartMenu()` in the `start` method - Declared Vbox startMenuVBox at the class level - Initialize the VBox in `createStartMenu()` method with a spacing of 80 - Center the VBox in the scene - Add VBox to the root pane - Resolved full root pane by using StackPane as the root container to allow layering of different elements on top of each other - Added original root `Pane` and the `startMenuVBox` are added to `layeredRoot` - Added more Javadocs
style.css - Added styling for the buttons
Main.java - Added `playSoundEffect` method & method call to play a sound effect when a heart is added

Main.java - Modify handle(KeyEvent event) method to toggle game's pause state when Esc key is pressed
GameEngine.java - Added a boolean flag to represent pause state - Added a pause/resume method - Modify existing threads to check for pause state in Update, PhysicsCalculation, and Render methods - Added isPaused Getter
GameEngine.java - Corrected indentations
Main.java & style.css - Added a white background to the score, level, heart labels
Main.java - Modified the `togglePause()` method to pause the background sound as well when pause button is pressed using MediaPlayer

Main.java - Add playAddHeartSoundEffect() method & method call to play a sound effect when a heart is added - Add playMinusHeartSoundEffect() method & method call to play a sound effect when a heart is deducted

Main.java - Added playBonusSoundEffect() method & method call to play a sound effect when bonus is activated
style.css - Update style attributes
SoundEffectUtil.java - Added a java class to manage the sound effects

ImageEffectUtil.java - Create a new java class & transfer the image effect methods from Main.java
SoundEffectUtil.java & Main.java - Added a mute sound key when user presses 'M' key

Main.java (saveGame & loadGame method)
- Implement the use of relative paths instead of hardcoded paths for save game function. - Decided on a directory name (i.e Saves) within the project's directory to store the saved game files. - Decided on name of save file (i.e save.mdds). - Added ObjectOutputStream to ensure the stream is closed properly after the operation, even if an exception occurs. - Added code to the method to use a seperate thread to perform file operations, preventing the UI from freezing during the save process.
Seperated resource elements into different folders and updated the paths accordingly
ImageEffectUtil.java - Added Javadocs
Main.java & style.css - Made the button enlarge when user hovers

- Moved the handle method from Main.java into a java class called GameController.java under Controller package to handle the user input of paddle
- Created an enum to improve readability and maintainability
SoundEffectUtil.java - Added a sound effect when hover over a button in start menu (not working)
- Transfered the move method from Main.java into GameController.java

- Transfered the shakeStage method from Main.java into a java class called StageEffectUtil.java in a package under brickGame package called stageEffects
- Transfered the initializePauseMenu method from Main.java into a java class called UserInterface.java in a package under brickGame package called View

- Transfered createStartMenu from Main.java to UserInterface.java
- Updated style.css (increase button size, button font size)
- Fixed hover button sound (working partially)
- Transfered classes & packages into Modal-View-Controller packages

SoundEffectUtil.java - MediaPlayer instance is initialized outside the playHoverSound method. This is so sound effect can be play immediately without delay caused by loading and initializing the media each time
Applied MVC

Main.java - Modified saveGame method (to convert Block color into a string using toString method) - Modified loadGame method (to convert the color string back to a Color object when loading each Block)
BlockSerializable.java - Included a String colorString field. This field will be used to store the color of the Block as a String
Block.java - Added a method getColor in the Block class to return Color of the block
Added Javadocs & comments
Added Javadocs & comments
Added additional Javadocs & transfered playBackgroundSound method from Main.java to SoundEffectUtil.java
Applied MVC & organised java classes into respective packages
Added playGameOverVideo method to play a mp4 file when player loses game
Added Javadocs to playGameOverVideo method
Applied MVC & fixed pause menu (Able to Display Now)
Fixed the pause menu to be in the center of the scene
Added exit button at Game Over scene and applied MVC to other java classes
Added comments to style.css
Transfered Java Classes
Added javadocs & comments
Added javadocs & comments
Remove unwanted resource
Push .gitignore

MESSAGE.value:
Main.java (saveGame & loadGame method)
- Implement the use of relative paths instead of hardcoded paths for save game function. - Decided on a directory name (i.e Saves) within the project's directory to store the saved game files. - Decided on name of save file (i.e save.mdds). - Added ObjectOutputStream to ensure the stream is closed properly after the operation, even if an exception occurs. - Added code to the method to use a seperate thread to perform file operations, preventing the UI from freezing during the save process.
Seperated resource elements into different folders and updated the paths accordingly
ImageEffectUtil.java - Added Javadocs
Main.java & style.css - Made the button enlarge when user hovers

- Moved the handle method from Main.java into a java class called GameController.java under Controller package to handle the user input of paddle
- Created an enum to improve readability and maintainability
SoundEffectUtil.java - Added a sound effect when hover over a button in start menu (not working)
- Transfered the move method from Main.java into GameController.java

- Transfered the shakeStage method from Main.java into a java class called StageEffectUtil.java in a package under brickGame package called stageEffects
- Transfered the initializePauseMenu method from Main.java into a java class called UserInterface.java in a package under brickGame package called View

- Transfered createStartMenu from Main.java to UserInterface.java
- Updated style.css (increase button size, button font size)
- Fixed hover button sound (working partially)
- Transfered classes & packages into Modal-View-Controller packages

SoundEffectUtil.java - MediaPlayer instance is initialized outside the playHoverSound method. This is so sound effect can be play immediately without delay caused by loading and initializing the media each time
Applied MVC

Main.java - Modified saveGame method (to convert Block color into a string using toString method) - Modified loadGame method (to convert the color string back to a Color object when loading each Block)
BlockSerializable.java - Included a String colorString field. This field will be used to store the color of the Block as a String
Block.java - Added a method getColor in the Block class to return Color of the block
Added Javadocs & comments
Added additional Javadocs & transfered playBackgroundSound method from Main.java to SoundEffectUtil.java
Applied MVC & organised java classes into respective packages
Added playGameOverVideo method to play a mp4 file when player loses game
Added Javadocs to playGameOverVideo method
Applied MVC & fixed pause menu (Able to Display Now)
Fixed the pause menu to be in the center of the scene
Added exit button at Game Over scene and applied MVC to other java classes
